name: Diet Check (please read instructions)
description:
Diet Check!

Lead your character to healthy food choices!

PLEASE READ THE INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS BELOW.

Play in browser

Controls

Click with your mouse to block path.

R - restart level.

Alt + F4 - close the game ( sorry, there's no menu :( )
